Title: anti-Taiwanese contacts poster
Publisher: Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局)
Notes: From a set of six posters, published by the Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局), warning against listening to Taiwanese propaganda. The text reads "The 'Heart War' broadcast by the Taiwan authorities is an enemy station, it is strictly prohibited to listen to".The characters hovering over the transistor radio read "Republic of China".
